participant_1.background:
I used to be a student, but now I'm trying to adjust to Swedish life.
I'm thinking about taking Tiki on a long hike this weekend.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.
I like to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs.
I take a selfie in my bathroom mirror before I go to school.

participant_2.background:
I love Disney movies, so I would have a crib mobile with Disney characters on it in my baby's nursery.
I'd brag about my ability to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore.
I am pretty close with my family.
I like to get Chick-fil-A on my way to work.
i speak fluent italian.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing?
I'm doing good! What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! What are your hobbies?
I love to sing, even though I have asthma and can't sing in a choir anymore.
Oh no, that's too bad. I love to sing too! What do you like to sing?
I love to sing Disney songs! What about you?
I love to sing Disney songs too! I also like to sing country music.
Oh nice! I love country music too! I'm originally from Texas.
Oh cool! I'm originally from California.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to visit California.
You should! It's a beautiful state.
I definitely will! I love to travel.
Me too! I love to see new places and meet new people.
Me too! I'm so glad we met!
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends
